mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_plan( mail_plan_id, name, template_id, creator, create_time, status, fail_reason, finish_time ) VALUES ( #{mailPlanId}, #{name}, #{templateId}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{status.value}, #{failReason}, #{finishTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT mp.name name, mt.name templateName, mp.creator creator, mp.create_time createTime, mp.status status, mp.fail_reason failReason, mp.finish_time finishTime FROM mail_plan mp INNER JOIN mail_template mt ON mp.template_id = mt.mail_template_id WHERE mp.mail_plan_id = #{mailPlanId}
mapper.update: UPDATE mail_plan SET status = #{status.value}, fail_reason = #{failReason}, finish_time = #{finishTime} WHERE mail_plan_id = #{mailPlanId}
